GDPR.UserTXT: As a user you will have the opportunity to create new projects and project templates. You will have the opportunity to edit existing templates on your profile. You will also have the opportunity to invite others to participate in your projects, as well as join projects you are invited to join.
GDPR.AdminTXT: As an administrator, you will have all the capabilities of a regular user. In addition, you will have access to fix, delete and event edit other users if anything they need help with or if something needs to be done. fixed.
GDPR.InfoSaveTXT: In our databases we will store your e-mail address and your password will be stored securely and encrypted so that it does not go astray. We will also store your projects. This includes which projects you save / owner, as well as projects you work on where your user is not the owner of the project. The last thing that will be saved is your role in the program, that is, if you are a normal user or administrator.
GDPR.InfoDeleteTXT: Once logged in you will be able to access the settings for your user. Inside the settings there will be a button to delete the user and all related information. Pressing this you will need to confirm that you want to remove all information belonging to your user. This is not reversible. After deleting everything it is not possible to recover the user and associated information.
GDPR.OBS!: Attention! This will NOT delete projects you do not own.
GDPR.localStorage: Grouse utilizes localstorage which means that some data will be stored on your computer. This data is used to store login information ('remember me' functionality) and nothing else. This data is locked to Grouse, which means that other sites that you visit will not be able to use this data. By registering a user you approve of the use of this data.

Remove.Sure?: Are you sure you want to delete this claim? This action cannot be undone !!

Delete.Sure?: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action is irreversible!!

UserEdit.Email-Invalid: The email is missing or in the wrong format
UserEdit.ConfirmedPasswordChangeDialogText:
Your password has been successfully updated! 
Remember to use your new password next time you sign in. No further action required now
UserEdit.DeleteUserText1: This is a non-reversible action, even if you get help from an administrator!
UserEdit.DeleteUserText2: We value your privacy, that's why this is a very destructive action. Your Email, Password and Projects will be lost forever, and there is no way to get them back
UserEdit.DeleteUserUH2: Please note that the following will not be deleted:
UserEdit.DeleteUserText3: Projects that you have contributed to but do not own will in no way change, this means that changes and additions that you have made will stay. Projects that utilize your templates will also stay as they were. The template itself will be gone but projects already created with it will stay
UserEdit.DeleteUserCheckDesc: I understand what will and will not be deleted:
UserEdit.DeleteUserError: There was an error during the deletion process
UserEdit.DeleteUserContact: Please contact an administrator and show them the following text:
UserEdit.DeleteConfirmed: Once you close this dialoguebox you will be sent to the sign-in page. There are no further actions you may perform with this account.

KravEdit.NotReady: The document will not be ready before all the requirements are accepted
